description:
In order to help his roommates, Hibiki resists Head Instructor Shian, but Shiori tells him to apologize. When Hibiki throws her off, the cell phone she`s been hiding falls out of her pocket. Hibiki then learns that everyone in his class is to be punished for his actions, and he finally makes up his mind to act...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: いばらの道へ踏み込め
